definition: paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: After spraying aint, sand it with #2000 aper.
sentences.chinese: 噴完正色用2000號砂紙打磨，然後噴光油。

sentences.english: Repair or replace the electric brush; clean the commutator surface by abrasive paper and blow it clean.
sentences.chinese: 修理或調換電刷，用木砂紙清理整流子表面，並吹淨。

sentences.english: "SUN" brand dry sanding paper(P120-P600) are used for furniture finishing and processing painted surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 太陽牌幹磨砂紙適用於傢俱油漆等。

sentences.english: In sandpaper, bone glue is actually the glue between the sand and the paper.
sentences.chinese: 砂紙中把砂和紙粘在一起的膠水實際上就是骨膠。

sentences.english: Grab some sandpaper after the glue has dried, and wear down the edge on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 膠水乾後準備一些砂紙，把封面的邊緣稍稍打磨光滑。

sentences.english: If you like, you can very lightly sand the rudder with fine grade sandpaper .
sentences.chinese: 如果您喜歡，您可以很輕易沙舵與罰款級砂紙。

sentences.english: Use a fine grain sandpaper to sand all the surfaces you want to stick paper to or paint over.
sentences.chinese: 用砂紙磨平所有你打算粘貼彩紙或是塗上油漆的桌面。

sentences.english: Gently sand the plastic to provide a key for the paint.
sentences.chinese: 用砂紙在塑料上悄悄打磨出粗糙面以便塗顏料。

sentences.english: I sanded away a little too much on some but only a little.
sentences.chinese: i砂紙遠離有點太多了一些，但只有一少。

sentences.english: The same tank but sanded nicely.
sentences.chinese: 同時，坦克，但用砂紙皆大歡喜。

sentences.english: I’m going to sand it and put on a light colored stain.
sentences.chinese: 我打算用砂紙磨光，然後着點淡色。

sentences.english: Perhaps use burnish of fine sand paper, tatty mark leaves on furniture.
sentences.chinese: 或者用細砂紙打磨，在傢俱上留下磨損的痕跡。

sentences.english: After spraying paint, sand it with #2000 paper.
sentences.chinese: 噴完正色用2000號砂紙打磨，然後噴光油。

sentences.english: Over primer, sand it again with #1500 paper.
sentences.chinese: 噴完水補土又用1500號砂紙再次打磨。

sentences.english: This sandpaper is extra rough, so you can work faster.
sentences.chinese: 這張砂紙特別粗糙，所以你可以幹得快些。

sentences.english: Sand paper or a wire brush on an electric drill.
sentences.chinese: 砂紙或鋼絲刷對一個電鑽。

definition: the spongy, white pulp inside the stem of rush plants, used as a wick for oil lamps
